title: MVP Launch - From Idea to Market in 90 Days
content:
50+ Successful MVP Launches - From Idea to Market in 90 Days

Complete MVP development and launch service. We take your idea from concept to a market-ready product with user testing, feedback integration, and go-to-market strategy.

Key Metrics:
- 90 Days to Launch
- 85% Success Rate
- 50% Cost Savings
- 24/7 Development Support

The MVP Development Challenge:

Most startups fail because they build products nobody wants. Lengthy development cycles and lack of user validation lead to costly mistakes.

Statistics:
- 90% Startup Failure Rate: Of startups fail due to building products without market validation
- 18 Months Average: Traditional development time from idea to launch - too slow for today's market
- $250K Wasted Investment: Average amount spent on failed products that never found product-market fit
- 42% No Market Need: Top reason for startup failure - building something customers don't want

Validated MVP Development That Works:

Our proven process combines rapid development with continuous user validation to ensure you build something people actually want.

1. Rapid Development
   - MVP built and launched in 90 days or less using proven development methodologies and frameworks

2. User Testing & Validation
   - Real user feedback integration throughout development to ensure product-market fit before launch

3. Go-to-Market Strategy
   - Complete launch plan including marketing strategy, pricing, and customer acquisition channels

4. Performance Analytics
   - Built-in analytics and tracking to measure user engagement and business metrics from day one

Complete MVP Launch Package Includes:
- Complete MVP development (web or mobile)
- User interface design and user experience
- User testing with real target customers
- Go-to-market strategy and launch plan
- Performance analytics and tracking setup
- 3 months of post-launch support
- Technical documentation and handover
- Scaling roadmap for future development

Our Proven 90-Day Process:

Week 1-2: Discovery & Planning
- Define requirements, user stories, and technical architecture for your MVP

Week 3-4: Design & Prototyping
- Create user interface designs and interactive prototypes for user testing

Week 5-10: Development & Testing
- Build your MVP with continuous user feedback and iterative improvements

Week 11-12: Launch & Optimize
- Deploy your MVP and implement go-to-market strategy with ongoing optimization

Testimonial:
"GTMVP took our idea from concept to paying customers in just 75 days. The user feedback integration was invaluable for product-market fit." - Altman, Founder of TaskFlow (Launched in 75 days, $50K MRR in 6 months)

Pricing:

MVP Launch Package: $2,500
- Fixed price for complete MVP development and launch
- 50% less than traditional development costs
- Complete MVP development (web or mobile)
- User interface design and user experience
- User testing with real target customers
- Go-to-market strategy and launch plan
- Performance analytics and tracking setup
- 3 months of post-launch support
- Technical documentation and handover
- Scaling roadmap for future development

Payment plan available • 90-day delivery guarantee • 3 months support included
